review: After the first month once every week.  Now every other month.  Total of 7 infusions so far. This month I am weak, muscel pains, stomach issues, memory not so good,  forgetful,  clumsy, dropping stuff for no reason. No energy or I will wake and forget about being sick and I tire easy. Tumor in mesentery has shunk fron 1.6 to 0.9. I guess it is working.  Not fun though.
